properties.name: general.app.description
properties.description: A brief description of the application.

properties.name: elastic.apm.enabled
properties.description: Indicates whether Elastic APM is enabled.

properties.name: general.app.loglevel
properties.description: The log level for the application.

properties.name: elastic.apm.server-url
properties.description: The server URL for Elastic APM.

properties.name: elastic.apm.service-name
properties.description: The service name for Elastic APM.

properties.name: elastic.apm.capture-body
properties.description: Indicates whether the body of requests should be captured by Elastic APM.

properties.name: elastic.apm.capture-headers
properties.description: Indicates whether headers of requests should be captured by Elastic APM.

properties.name: elastic.apm.application-packages
properties.description: The application packages monitored by Elastic APM.

properties.name: elastic.apm.log-level
properties.description: The log level for Elastic APM.

properties.name: elastic.apm.environment
properties.description: The environment for Elastic APM (e.g., production, development).
